description: Least number represented as the sum of n cubes with greedy algorithm.
links: Rick L. Shepherd, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..28
prog: (PARI){default(realprecision, 255); v = []; n = 1;while(n < 29,  if(n < 8,    a = n, a = v[n-1] + ceil(sqrt(v[n-1]/3 + 1/4) - 1/2)^3);  v = concat(v, a);  write("b055402.txt", n, " ", v[n]); n++)}\\ _Rick L. Shepherd_, Jan 30 2014
author: _Henry Bottomley_, May 16 2000
